abort.already_configured: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress

user.description: Manually configure your Bang & Olufsen device.

invalid_grouping_entity.message: Entity with id: {entity_id} can't be added to the Beolink session. Is the entity a Bang & Olufsen media_player?

invalid_media_type.message: {invalid_media_type} is an invalid type. Valid values are: {valid_media_types}.

invalid_sound_mode.message: {invalid_sound_mode} is an invalid sound mode. Valid values are: {valid_sound_modes}.

m3u_invalid_format.message: Media sources with the .m3u extension are not supported.

non_deezer_seeking.message: Seeking is currently only supported when using Deezer

play_media_error.message: An error occurred while attempting to play {media_type}: {error_message}.
